reviews.subject: Computer Science
reviews.review: Dr. Johnson is very knowledgeable and makes complex topics easier to understand.

reviews.subject: Mathematics
reviews.review: Dr. Smith is an excellent professor who explains concepts clearly and is very approachable.

reviews.subject: Physics
reviews.review: Dr. Davis is good, but the lectures can be quite dry and difficult to follow.

reviews.subject: Chemistry
reviews.review: Dr. Lee is passionate about chemistry and makes the labs engaging and fun.

reviews.subject: Biology
reviews.review: Dr. Wilson is fantastic, with a great way of relating biology to real-world applications.

reviews.subject: Economics
reviews.review: Dr. Brown's lectures are often hard to follow and lack practical examples.

reviews.subject: History
reviews.review: Dr. Miller has a lot of knowledge, but the lectures are sometimes unorganized.

reviews.subject: Philosophy
reviews.review: Dr. Taylor encourages deep thinking and discussion, making philosophy very engaging.

reviews.subject: Psychology
reviews.review: Dr. Martinez is insightful and provides excellent real-life examples to support psychological theories.

reviews.subject: English Literature
reviews.review: Dr. Anderson is knowledgeable but sometimes lacks enthusiasm in his teaching.

reviews.subject: Sociology
reviews.review: Dr. Thomas presents sociology in a way that is both interesting and relatable.

reviews.subject: Political Science
reviews.review: Dr. Harris is difficult to understand and the course lacks structure.

reviews.subject: Art History
reviews.review: Dr. Clark is incredibly passionate about art and makes every lecture captivating.

reviews.subject: Engineering
reviews.review: Dr. Lewis is very knowledgeable and provides practical examples that are helpful.

reviews.subject: Music
reviews.review: Dr. Walker is good, but sometimes the class feels disorganized.

reviews.subject: Business Administration
reviews.review: Dr. Young provides real-world insights and makes business concepts easier to grasp.

reviews.subject: Environmental Science
reviews.review: Dr. Hall's lectures are often monotonous and lack depth in the subject matter.

reviews.subject: Theology
reviews.review: Dr. Scott is knowledgeable but the course could benefit from more interactive elements.

reviews.subject: Statistics
reviews.review: Dr. Green is clear and concise, making statistics less intimidating.

reviews.subject: Computer Engineering
reviews.review: Dr. Adams is exceptional at breaking down complex topics and is always available for help.
